module("tinymce.plugins.Legacyoutput", {\n \tsetupModule: function() {\n \t\tQUnit.stop();\n \n \t\ttinymce.init({\n \t\t\tselector: "textarea",\n \t\t\tadd_unload_trigger: false,\n \t\t\tskin: false,\n \t\t\tplugins: \'legacyoutput\',\n \t\t\tinit_instance_callback: function(ed) {\n \t\t\t\twindow.editor = ed;\n \t\t\t\tQUnit.start();\n \t\t\t}\n \t\t});\n \t}\n });\n \n test("Font color", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'forecolor\', false, \'#FF0000\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent().toLowerCase(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Font size", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'fontsize\', false, 7);\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Font face", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'fontname\', false, "times");\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Bold", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'bold\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Italic", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'italic\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Underline", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'underline\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Strikethrough", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'strikethrough\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Justifyleft", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'justifyleft\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Justifycenter", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'justifycenter\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Justifyright", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'justifyright\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

text

\');\n });\n \n test("Justifyfull", function() {\n \teditor.setContent(\'

text

\');\n \tUtils.setSelection(\'p\', 0, \'p\', 4);\n \teditor.execCommand(\'justifyfull\');\n \tequal(editor.getContent(), \'

\');\n });
